title: House in Panadura
details: "Nicely located land with house, just 1 mile to Panadura town. Good residential area with peaceful environment. Reputed school area, walking distance. 3 bedroom house in 20 perch square lot access to carpet road. House size: 1200sqft. Bedrooms: 3, Baths: 1, Land size: 20 perches. Selling price: 675000 per perch."
